title: VCMI battlefield format
description: Format used to define new battlefields in VCMI

compatibilityIdentifiers.description: Additional identifiers that may refer to this object, to provide compatibility after object has been renamed

isSpecial.description: Shows if this battleground has own obstacles

bonuses.description: List of bonuses that will affect all battles on this battlefield

music.description: Optional, filename for custom music to play during combat on this terrain

openingSound.description: Optional, filename for custom sound to play during combat opening on this terrain

impassableHexes.description: List of battle hexes that will be always blocked on this battlefield (e.g. ship to ship battles)

limitToLayers.description: Optional, list of layer types where this battlefield is used (e.g. ["underground"])
